name: 3D Platformer Tutorial (ETM_Games)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Tutorial! For complete project I plan on adding:

1) Spikes that cause damage

2) A powerup that makes a player invincible for a short duration of time.

3) New levels

All of these will help add more variety to level designing and make it easier to keep the player engaged.

Created by Evan McDonnell
